name: Meme Dragons
description: In the year 4020 humanity discovered sleeping dragons on Mars. Being the great patrons we are, we hooked them up with some gene therapy and now they’re sentient! Fire. Everything’s on fire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or later Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
